morphInfos.tenseExplained: it is happening in the present
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does to oneself or for oneself
morphInfos.moodExplained: saying that an action should or must happen
morphInfos.personExplained: they are the ones being spoken or written to
morphInfos.numberExplained: there are two or more of them
morphInfos.explanation: an action that certainly happens to or for persons being spoken or written to
